reviews.text:
Please, do not take Arnold's for granted. Support them, i would cycle here just for that to get my fried chicken needs sorted out from time to time. But, for those who do not fancy fresh, tasty juicy crispy chicken parts, do not fret! Plentiful of food selections to fill your stomachs, and also enjoy a hot bowl of soft soya bean curd just on the left of the main entrance staircase. Have some fruits and snacks as you head out to go about your dailies. And, should you somehow dropped and crack your phone along the way, there is a very reputable phone repair shop!

Come get your peace of mind and heart at this very cosy mall, have your stomachs filled and happiness with your loved ones here!

This is definitely one of the better shopping malls in Singapore with good yummy restaurantsss with convenient paywave payment opening till wee hours every single day, 24 hours Giants Supermarket, With Anytime fitness, n Gamers and Pet lovers shop too. This is already the enough reasons why It is a five stars! I live at the prestigious beautiful Condominium right beside it, so Wowwwwwwwww… I can go downstairs to the shopping mall anytime I wanted! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Parking lots are tight.
When heavy rain, there’s flash flood in the underground carpark.
Lots of weird stares from maids in agencies. The food choices are not bad.

Lift is super slow, elevators are under repair most of the time.

Small shops are more with very reasonable prices and more services are available. Hockercentre and car parking are available. Nice place explore affordable small shops for decent prices. I visiting an Indian grocery store which is very good.
Nice little heartland mall with good mix of shops and eateries. What it lacks is air conditioning.
